Texts.Chs:
你^red;最最重要^reset;的随身装备。为所有^cyan;FrackinUniverse^reset;核心功能所用。
^cyan;左键^reset;：检查状态
^yellow;右键^reset;：任务菜单
^green;Shift+左键^reset;：物质枪设置
Texts.Eng:
Your ^red;most important^reset; piece of equipment. Used for all core ^cyan;FrackinUniverse^reset; functions.
Use to access the following features:
^cyan;Primary^reset;: Check Status
^yellow;Secondary^reset;: Quest Menu
^green;Shift^reset;: Configure MM Settings
